about.title: About
about.description: This section provides an overview of our project, including our mission, values, and the team behind it. Discover who we are and what drives us.

Tokenomics.title: Tokenomics
Tokenomics.description: Dive into the economic model of our token, including its distribution, utility, and the mechanisms in place to ensure its long-term viability. Learn how our token is designed to support both our project and its users.
